short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 在 YouTube 上发送和查看弹幕。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Danmaku Plugin

This plugin enhances your YouTube viewing experience by adding interactive fun. With this plugin, you can send and view real-time comments (danmaku) while watching videos. Easy to install and compatible with major browsers, it effortlessly elevates your viewing experience.

这款插件为您的 YouTube 观看体验增添了互动乐趣。通过该插件，您可以在观看视频时发送和查看实时弹幕，与其他观众即时交流。安装简单，兼容主流浏览器，轻松提升您的观看体验。
